summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1334, for the improvement of the alley in Block Seven (7), D. S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley between First Avenue South, Occidental Avenue, Washington Street and Main Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 14980, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
